entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9 except minus 5 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 9 except minus 5 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 20 January 2023
